name: Le Bonk - Academic Version
description:
Notice: This game requires at least 2 players with controllers to be playable!

Le Bonk is an action-packed game where you assume the role of a mole armed with a hammer and compete against other moles in the Moleanship. Your goal is to knock your opponents off the stage while remaining the last one standing.



Immerse yourself in an exciting world that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking. Throw your hammer at your opponents to unbalance them with a powerful strike. However, be careful not to be pushed to the edge of doom yourself!



Use the environment to your advantage by burrowing into the ground to avoid incoming hammers. With your speed, you can swiftly move towards your opponents and deliver a mighty blow.



The game features an appealing design that perfectly reflects the gameplay. Each level introduces unique third-party events, making the game even more captivating.



Get ready for an thrilling adventure filled with action and tactical challenges. Become the master of Le Bonk and defeat your opponents to stand as the last mole on the hill.
